Body:
I'm trying to list out all the services of Watson IoT Platform, as deployed against a given Organisation and Space.

Say, for example, I have 3 different Watson IoT Platform services deployed and now, when I use bx service list" It lists all services
column9: including Watson IoT Platform services.	Now
column10: if I know the name of my Watson IoT Platform service
column11:
then I can type in "bx service show iotf-service"

Are you aware of BX SERVICE command or an equivalent REST API that I can leverage

Body:
there isn't a bx service command to show you only the desired services, but (assuming that you are on windows) you can use:

bx service list | find iotf-service"

this will grab only the "iotf-service"

"
